description.zh-CN: 纸张剪裁风格，采用分层元素和阴影创造立体剪纸效果。展现精致分层构图、层次深度和纸艺美学。纸质剪贴风格采用分层元素和阴影效果。创造复杂纸质视觉和动态内容组织。
description.en-US: Paper cutout design style with layered elements and shadow creating immersive and engaging digital experiences through thoughtful design principles, modern aesthetics, and user-centered approach to interface creating immersive and engaging digital experiences through thoughtful design principles, modern aesthetics, and user-centered approach to interface development Generates layered, dimensional effects mimicking paper cutting Ideal for craft applications, children's content, and artistic experiences. layered composition for sophisticated visual storytelling. Ensures exceptional design quality through strategic principles and thoughtful implementation. Creates sophisticated layered composition with dynamic visual storytelling and refined shadow effects.
